Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“Ma, I’m home!”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Ma, I’m home!”

Monologue.Current: Ma Dincht{Line}“Zell, what a surprise!{Line} Are these your friends?”
Monologue.Original: Ma Dincht{Line}“Zell, what a surprise!{Line} Are these your friends?”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“This is my house.{Line} But don’t make yourselves too comfortable!”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“This is my house.{Line} But don’t make yourselves too comfortable!”

Monologue.Current: Ma Dincht{Line}“Take care of Zell for me.”
Monologue.Original: Ma Dincht{Line}“Take care of Zell for me.”

Monologue.Current: Ma Dincht{Line}“Are you Zell’s friends?{Line} You’re from Garden, right?”
Monologue.Original: Ma Dincht{Line}“Are you Zell’s friends?{Line} You’re from Garden, right?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Zell...”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“Zell...”

Monologue.Current: “If you see a rowdy boy named Zell,{Line} please try to be friends with him.”
Monologue.Original: “If you see a rowdy boy named Zell,{Line} please try to be friends with him.”

Monologue.Current: Ma Dincht{Line}“Oh, Zell.{Line} Are you off today?”
Monologue.Original: Ma Dincht{Line}“Oh, Zell.{Line} Are you off today?”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“Nah, outdoor class.”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Nah, outdoor class.”

Monologue.Current: Ma Dincht{Line}“Drop by whenever you can.{Line} Even just to say hi.”
Monologue.Original: Ma Dincht{Line}“Drop by whenever you can.{Line} Even just to say hi.”

Monologue.Current: Ma Dincht{Line}“That rascal is here again today.{Line} Go say hello.{Line} He really looks up to you, you know.”
Monologue.Original: Ma Dincht{Line}“That rascal is here again today.{Line} Go say hello.{Line} He really looks up to you, you know.”

Monologue.Current: Ma Dincht{Line}“Make yourself at home.”
Monologue.Original: Ma Dincht{Line}“Make yourself at home.”

Monologue.Current: “Как там поживает мой хулиганчик?”
Monologue.Original: “How’s my rowdy boy doing?”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“S’up!{Line} How’s it going!?”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“S’up!{Line} How’s it going!?”

Monologue.Current: “Good to see you, Zell.{Line} You look stronger{Line} every time I see you.”
Monologue.Original: “Good to see you, Zell.{Line} You look stronger{Line} every time I see you.”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“Well, yeah...I guess so.{Line} Been ragin’ up a storm all over the place.”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Well, yeah...I guess so.{Line} Been ragin’ up a storm all over the place.”

Monologue.Current: “That’s...very good.{Line} ...But...”
Monologue.Original: “That’s...very good.{Line} ...But...”

Monologue.Current: “Here, in Balamb...”{Next}“My boy’s doing the same,{Line} trying to be like you.”
Monologue.Original: “Here, in Balamb...”{Next}“My boy’s doing the same,{Line} trying to be like you.”

Monologue.Current: “He even tries to speak like you...”{Next}“All this ‘Yo’ and ‘S’up’...{Line} He can’t even say ‘hello’.”
Monologue.Original: “He even tries to speak like you...”{Next}“All this ‘Yo’ and ‘S’up’...{Line} He can’t even say ‘hello’.”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“Yo, so are you sayin’{Line} it’s my fault?”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Yo, so are you sayin’{Line} it’s my fault?”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“...Ahh,{Pause 48} I guess it is.{Line} ...Sorry.”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“...Ahh,{Pause 48} I guess it is.{Line} ...Sorry.”

Monologue.Current: “He looks up to you.{Line} He can’t help it.”
Monologue.Original: “He looks up to you.{Line} He can’t help it.”

Monologue.Current: “You’re such a bad influence, Zell.”
Monologue.Original: “You’re such a bad influence, Zell.”

Monologue.Current: “Your mother’s looking after{Line} my boy while I’m working.”
Monologue.Original: “Your mother’s looking after{Line} my boy while I’m working.”

Monologue.Current: “He can be so uncontrollable sometimes!”
Monologue.Original: “He can be so uncontrollable sometimes!”

Monologue.Current: Ma Dincht{Line}“Hahaha... I’m used to{Line} out-of-control boys.”
Monologue.Original: Ma Dincht{Line}“Hahaha... I’m used to{Line} out-of-control boys.”

Monologue.Current: “Don’t you worry about a thing.{Line} Just concentrate on your work.”
Monologue.Original: “Don’t you worry about a thing.{Line} Just concentrate on your work.”

Monologue.Current: “I really appreciate your help.{Line} I hope my boy doesn’t trouble you.”
Monologue.Original: “I really appreciate your help.{Line} I hope my boy doesn’t trouble you.”

Monologue.Current: “Zell, you better not be{Line} causing others any trouble.”
Monologue.Original: “Zell, you better not be{Line} causing others any trouble.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“......?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“......?”

Monologue.Current: “There’s a frog inside{Line} the umbrella stand?”
Monologue.Original: “There’s a frog inside{Line} the umbrella stand?”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“Nasty!{Line} My ma hates frogs!”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Nasty!{Line} My ma hates frogs!”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“This painting...”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“This painting...”

Monologue.Current: “There’s some writing in the corner.{Line} Is that supposed to be there?”
Monologue.Original: “There’s some writing in the corner.{Line} Is that supposed to be there?”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“No way! Really!?{Line} This is my masterpiece from{Line} when I was a kid!”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“No way! Really!?{Line} This is my masterpiece from{Line} when I was a kid!”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“Yo, {Char Squall}!”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Yo, {Char Squall}!”

Monologue.Current: “That’s my room up there!{Line} It’s sacred! So just keep out!”
Monologue.Original: “That’s my room up there!{Line} It’s sacred! So just keep out!”

Monologue.Current: Мама Динча{Line}“Наверху комната {Char Zell}а.{Line} Он очень злится, если кто-нибудь{Line} заходит туда, поэтому я была бы{Line} благодарна, если бы вы не поднимались.”
Monologue.Original: Ma Dincht{Line}“That’s Zell’s room up there.{Line} He gets angry if anyone goes in,{Line} so I’d appreciate it if you didn’t.”

Monologue.Current: Ma Dincht{Line}“Welcome back, Zell.{Line} I hope you’re all right.”
Monologue.Original: Ma Dincht{Line}“Welcome back, Zell.{Line} I hope you’re all right.”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“......”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“......”

Monologue.Current: Ma Dincht{Line}“Balamb is back to normal,{Line} and so is everyone else.”
Monologue.Original: Ma Dincht{Line}“Balamb is back to normal,{Line} and so is everyone else.”

Monologue.Current: “...But,{Line} I guess you can’t come home yet,{Line} can you, Zell...?”
Monologue.Original: “...But,{Line} I guess you can’t come home yet,{Line} can you, Zell...?”

Monologue.Current: Ma Dincht{Line}“Thank you for{Line} all you’ve done for Balamb.”
Monologue.Original: Ma Dincht{Line}“Thank you for{Line} all you’ve done for Balamb.”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“Yo, ma! Has anyone come by to see me?{Line} Someone with a pigtail...”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Yo, ma! Has anyone come by to see me?{Line} Someone with a pigtail...”

Monologue.Current: Ma Dincht{Line}“Huh? What’s this all of a sudden...?{Pause 88}{Line} ...No one’s stopped by.”
Monologue.Original: Ma Dincht{Line}“Huh? What’s this all of a sudden...?{Pause 88}{Line} ...No one’s stopped by.”

Monologue.Current: Ma Dincht{Line}“So you’re going to have another friend visit?{Line} I’m looking forward to meeting this person.”
Monologue.Original: Ma Dincht{Line}“So you’re going to have another friend visit?{Line} I’m looking forward to meeting this person.”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“That’s strange...”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“That’s strange...”

Monologue.Current: “Yes? Have you improved your game?”{Line}Yes{Line}No
Monologue.Original: “Yes? Have you improved your game?”{Line}Yes{Line}No

Monologue.Current: “So, you know rules{Line} that don’t exist here?{Line} Then let’s play a game with{Line} Balamb’s rules and ours.”
Monologue.Original: “So, you know rules{Line} that don’t exist here?{Line} Then let’s play a game with{Line} Balamb’s rules and ours.”

Monologue.Current: “So, you know rules{Line} that don’t exist here?{Line} Then let’s play a game with{Line} Galbadia’s rules and ours.”
Monologue.Original: “So, you know rules{Line} that don’t exist here?{Line} Then let’s play a game with{Line} Galbadia’s rules and ours.”

Monologue.Current: “So, you know rules{Line} that don’t exist here?{Line} Then let’s play a game with{Line} Trabia’s rules and ours.”
Monologue.Original: “So, you know rules{Line} that don’t exist here?{Line} Then let’s play a game with{Line} Trabia’s rules and ours.”

Monologue.Current: “So, you know rules{Line} that don’t exist here?{Line} Then let’s play a game with{Line} Centra’s rules and ours.”
Monologue.Original: “So, you know rules{Line} that don’t exist here?{Line} Then let’s play a game with{Line} Centra’s rules and ours.”

Monologue.Current: “So, you know rules{Line} that don’t exist here?{Line} Then let’s play a game with{Line} Dollet’s rules and ours.”
Monologue.Original: “So, you know rules{Line} that don’t exist here?{Line} Then let’s play a game with{Line} Dollet’s rules and ours.”

Monologue.Current: “So, you know rules{Line} that don’t exist here?{Line} Then let’s play a game with{Line} FH’s rules and ours.”
Monologue.Original: “So, you know rules{Line} that don’t exist here?{Line} Then let’s play a game with{Line} FH’s rules and ours.”

Monologue.Current: “So, you know rules{Line} that don’t exist here?{Line} Then let’s play a game with{Line} Lunar’s rules and ours.”
Monologue.Original: “So, you know rules{Line} that don’t exist here?{Line} Then let’s play a game with{Line} Lunar’s rules and ours.”

Monologue.Current: “So, you know rules{Line} that don’t exist here?{Line} Then let’s play a game with{Line} Esthar’s rules and ours.”
Monologue.Original: “So, you know rules{Line} that don’t exist here?{Line} Then let’s play a game with{Line} Esthar’s rules and ours.”
